levels.description: Mild pain - noticeable but not interfering with daily activities
Minor pain - noticeable and slightly interfering with daily activities
Uncomfortable pain - distracting and more difficult to ignore
Moderate pain - significantly distracting and limits daily activities
Moderately strong pain - very distracting, significantly limits daily activities
Strong pain - intensely distracting, activities greatly limited
Very strong pain - dominates senses, significantly impairs activities
Intense pain - physical activity severely limited, hard to concentrate
Excruciating pain - unable to engage in normal activities, requires urgent attention
Unimaginable pain - unbearable, unable to function, requires emergency attention
